14 // Utility Function to compute distance between two poses
15 double
16 NavigationProcessing::compute_dist_between_poses(nav_msgs::Odometry pose1, nav_msgs::Odometry pose2)
17 {
18  double x1 = pose1.pose.pose.position.x;
19  double y1 = pose1.pose.pose.position.y;
20  double x2 = pose2.pose.pose.position.x;
21  double y2 = pose2.pose.pose.position.y;
22  return compute_dist(x1, y1, x2, y2);
23 }
24 
25 
26 // Utility Function to compute scalar distance
27 double
28 NavigationProcessing::compute_dist(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
29 {
30  return sqrt(pow(x1 - x2, 2) + pow(y1 - y2, 2));
31 }

33 
34 // Utility Function to convert poses between frames with the assistance of Eigen library
35 geometry_msgs::PoseStamped
36 NavigationProcessing::transform_goal_frame(nav_msgs::Odometry pose1, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_shift)
37 {
38  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped odom_T_robot; // Input poses to PoseStamped
39  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped odom_T_shifted;
40  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped robot_T_shift;
41  Eigen::Affine3d odom_T_robot_3d; // 4x4 robot pose
42  Eigen::Affine3d robot_T_shift_3d; // 4x4 shift pose
43  Eigen::Affine3d odom_T_shifted_3d; // 4x4 shifted desired pose
44 
45  odom_T_robot.pose = pose1.pose.pose; // Input pose
46  robot_T_shift.pose.position = pose_shift.pose.position; // Input shift pose
47 
48  tf::poseMsgToEigen(odom_T_robot.pose, odom_T_robot_3d); // Convert robot pose to 4x4 transform matrix
49  tf::poseMsgToEigen(robot_T_shift.pose, robot_T_shift_3d); // Convert shifted pose to 4x4 transform matrix
50 
51  odom_T_shifted_3d = odom_T_robot_3d * robot_T_shift_3d; // Matrix multiplication to obtain desired shifted pose in world frame
52 
53  tf::poseEigenToMsg(odom_T_shifted_3d, odom_T_shifted.pose); // Convert back to normal pose consisting of position and orientation components
54  return odom_T_shifted;
55 }
56 
57 
58 // Utility Function to compute assistance mode poses for robot_0
59 std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>
60 NavigationProcessing::computeAssitModePoses(nav_msgs::Odometry robot1_stationary_odom)
61 {
62  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped shift_pose1;
63  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped shift_pose2;
64 
65  shift_pose1.pose.position.x = -0.50; // Pose thats behind R1 and offset 0.5m in y-axis
66  shift_pose1.pose.position.y = 0.50;
67 
68  shift_pose2.pose.position.x = 0.00; // Pose thats in same location as R1 in x-axis but offset by 0.5m in y-axis
69  shift_pose2.pose.position.y = 0.50;
70 
71  std::vector<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped> assit_mode_poses; // Container to hold assist mode poses
72  assit_mode_poses.push_back(transform_goal_frame(robot1_stationary_odom, shift_pose1)); // Pass in R1 pose and the desired XY shift to obtain the goal pose
73  assit_mode_poses.push_back(transform_goal_frame(robot1_stationary_odom, shift_pose2));
74 
75  return assit_mode_poses; // Return poses for execution
76 }
